shlok_hindi: निर्वैरः सर्वभूतेषु यः स मामेति पाण्डव ॥ ११-५५॥
shlok_hinglish: nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa māmeti pāṇḍava  11-55
shlok_english: He who does actions for Me, who looks upon Me as the Supreme, who is devoted to Me, who is free from attachment, who bears enmity towards none, he comes to Me, O Pandava.

defs.meaning: freed from the contamination of fruitive activities and mental speculation
